column.name: band
column.description: WISE band number (1-4)

column.name: naxis
column.description: number of data axes

column.name: naxis1
column.description: number of pixels in x (data axis 1)

column.name: naxis2
column.description: number of pixels in y (data axis 2)

column.name: wrelease
column.description: release version of WSDS pipeline

column.name: crpix1
column.description: reference pixel value for axis 1 (x)

column.name: crpix2
column.description: reference pixel value for axis 2 (y)

column.name: crval1
column.description: reference position RA (FK5 J2000) at crpix1,crpix2

column.name: crval2
column.description: reference position Dec (FK5 J2000) at crpix1,crpix2

column.name: ctype1
column.description: projection type (with distortion) for axis 1 (x)

column.name: ctype2
column.description: projection type (with distortion) for axis 2 (y)

column.name: equinox
column.description: equinox of WCS information

column.name: bunit
column.description: image data unit

column.name: elon
column.description: ecliptic longitude of crpix1,crpix2

column.name: elat
column.description: ecliptic latitude of crpix1,crpix2

column.name: glon
column.description: galactic longitude of crpix1,crpix2

column.name: glat
column.description: galactic latitude of crval1,crval2

column.name: ra1
column.description: RA (FK5 J2000) of corner #1 (crpix1,crpix2=-.5,-.5)

column.name: dec1
column.description: Dec (FK5 J2000) of corner #1 (crpix1,crpix2=-.5,-.5)

column.name: ra2
column.description: RA (FK5 J2000) of corner #2 (crpix1,crpix2=naxis1+.5,-.5)

column.name: dec2
column.description: Dec (FK5 J2000) of corner #2 (crpix1,crpix2=naxis1+.5,-.5)

column.name: ra3
column.description: RA (FK5 J2000) of corner #3 (crpix1,crpix2=naxis1+.5,naxis2+.5)

column.name: dec3
column.description: Dec (FK5 J2000) of corner #3 (crpix1,crpix2=naxis1+.5,naxis2+.5)

column.name: ra4
column.description: RA (FK5 J2000) of corner #4 (crpix1,crpix2=-.5,naxis2+.5)

column.name: dec4
column.description: Dec (FK5 J2000) of corner #4 (crpix1,crpix2=-.5,naxis2+.5)

column.name: magzp
column.description: relative photometric zero-point mag

column.name: magzpunc
column.description: 1-sigma uncertainty in photometric zero-point mag

column.name: modeint
column.description: mode of pixel DN in frame within lowest sigma partition

column.name: scan_id
column.description: scan ID

column.name: scangrp
column.description: scan group ID

column.name: frame_num
column.description: frame number in scan

column.name: l0file
column.description: corresponding level 0 image file name

column.name: date_obs
column.description: date and time of mid-point of frame observation, UTC

column.name: mjd_obs
column.description: modified julian date of mid-point of frame observation, UTC

column.name: icaldir
column.description: reference dir used for ICAL

column.name: dtanneal
column.description: time since last anneal

column.name: utanneal
column.description: date and time of last anneal, UTC

column.name: unixt
column.description: UNIX date-time in sec of mid-point of frame observation, UTC

column.name: ephemt
column.description: ephemeris date-time in sec of mid-point of frame observation, UTC

column.name: exptime
column.description: frame exposure time

column.name: tsamp
column.description: time interval between non-destructively read samples-up-the-ramp

column.name: wcdelt1
column.description: deg/pix scale at crpix1,crpix2 for axis 1 (x)

column.name: wcdelt2
column.description: deg/pix scale at crpix1,crpix2 for axis 2 (y)

column.name: crder1
column.description: uncertainty in crval1 (RA)

column.name: crder2
column.description: uncertainty in crval2 (Dec)

column.name: csdradec
column.description: costandard deviation in crval1 and crval2 (RA and Dec)

column.name: pxscal1
column.description: arcsec/pix scale at crpix1,crpix2 for axis 1 (x)

column.name: pxscal2
column.description: arcsec/pix scale at crpix1,crpix2 for axis 2 (y)

column.name: uncrts1
column.description: uncertainty in wcdelt1

column.name: uncrts2
column.description: uncertainty in wcdelt2

column.name: wcrota2
column.description: image twist angle of +axis2 W of N

column.name: pa
column.description: position angle of +axis2 E of N

column.name: uncrtpa
column.description: uncertainty in position angle

column.name: skew
column.description: measure of non-orthogonality of frame axes

column.name: cd1_1
column.description: CD matrix element 1,1

column.name: cd1_2
column.description: CD matrix element 1,2

column.name: cd2_1
column.description: CD matrix element 2,1

column.name: cd2_2
column.description: CD matrix element 2,2

column.name: qa_status
column.description: QA status for scan: Prelim, Reviewed, or Final

column.name: qual_frame
column.description: quality score value for frame

column.name: debgain
column.description: digital electronics box gain (e-/eff. slope units, Sample-Up-the-Ramp weights)

column.name: febgain
column.description: flight electronics box gain for individual non-destructively read samples in ramp

column.name: moon_sep
column.description: distance from frame center to moon

column.name: saa_sep
column.description: distance from frame center to SAA boundary

column.name: qc_fact
column.description: quality factor qc value for frame: completion quality

column.name: qi_fact
column.description: quality factor qi value for frame: image quality

column.name: qn_fact
column.description: quality factor qn value for frame: noise quality

column.name: qa_fact
column.description: quality factor qa value for frame: astrometry quality

column.name: q1_fact
column.description: quality factor TBD value for scan: TBD

column.name: q2_fact
column.description: quality factor TBD value for scan: TBD

column.name: q3_fact
column.description: quality factor TBD value for scan: TBD

column.name: q4_fact
column.description: quality factor TBD value for scan: TBD

column.name: q5_fact
column.description: quality factor TBD value for scan: TBD

column.name: qual_scan
column.description: quality score value for scan

column.name: qs1_fact
column.description: quality factor qs1 value for scan: 1x1 scansynch quality

column.name: qs5_fact
column.description: quality factor TBD value for scan: TBD

column.name: qp_fact
column.description: quality factor qp value for scan: photometric quality

column.name: qs_fact
column.description: quality factor qs value for scan: TBD

column.name: q6_fact
column.description: quality factor TBD value for scan: TBD

column.name: q7_fact
column.description: quality factor TBD value for scan: TBD

column.name: q8_fact
column.description: quality factor TBD value for scan: TBD

column.name: q9_fact
column.description: quality factor TBD value for scan: TBD

column.name: q10_fact
column.description: quality factor TBD value for scan: TBD

column.name: date_imgprep
column.description: date image prepared

column.name: load_id
column.description: unique load ID number

column.name: cntr
column.description: unique record ID

column.name: x
column.description: unit sphere position x = cos(crval1)*cos(crval2)

column.name: y
column.description: unit sphere position y = sin(crval1)*cos(crval2)

column.name: z
column.description: unit sphere position z = sin(crval2)

column.name: spt_ind
column.description: Level 7 HTM index of (crval1, crval2), decimal encoding

column.name: image_set
column.description: TBD

column.name: magzp
column.description: relative photometric zero-point mag

column.name: magzpunc
column.description: 1-sigma uncertainty in photometric zero-point mag

column.name: coadd_id
column.description: coadd ID

column.name: fcdate
column.description: date and time of file creation, UTC

column.name: date_obs1
column.description: date and time of observation of earliest frame in coadd, UTC

column.name: mid_obs
column.description: date and time of observation of middle frame in coadd, UTC

column.name: date_obs2
column.description: date and time of observation of latest frame in coadd, UTC

column.name: sizex
column.description: linear dimension of coadd along axis 1 (x)

column.name: sizey
column.description: linear dimension of coadd along axis 2 (y)

column.name: pxscal1
column.description: arcsec/pix scale at crpix1,crpix2 for axis 1 (x)

column.name: pxscal2
column.description: arcsec/pix scale at crpix1,crpix2 for axis 2 (y)

column.name: moonrej
column.description: number of frames rejected due to moon-glow

column.name: mooninp
column.description: initial number of input frames with suspected moon-glow

column.name: medint
column.description: median of intensity pixels

column.name: medcov
column.description: median depth of coverage in coadd

column.name: mincov
column.description: minimum depth of coverage in coadd

column.name: maxcov
column.description: maximum depth of coverage in coadd

column.name: lowcovpc1
column.description: percent area of coadd footprint with coverage depth <= 4 pixels

column.name: lowcovpc2
column.description: percent area of coadd footprint with coverage depth <= 6 pixels

column.name: nomcovpc
column.description: percent area of coadd footprint with coverage depth <= 8 pixels

column.name: mincovpc
column.description: percent area of coadd footprint with coverage depth TBD pixels

column.name: robsig
column.description: robust spatial sigma at medcov +/- 0.25

column.name: pixchis1
column.description: ratio of robust spatial sigma / median uncertainty at medcov +/- 0.25

column.name: pixchis2
column.description: ratio of robust spatial sigma / modal uncertainty at medcov +/- 0.25

column.name: mednmsk
column.description: median number of pixels masked per frame

column.name: cdelt1
column.description: deg/pix scale at crpix1,crpix2 for axis 1 (x)

column.name: cdelt2
column.description: deg/pix scale at crpix1,crpix2 for axis 2 (y)

column.name: crota2
column.description: image twist angle of +axis2 W of N

column.name: bitmask
column.description: fatal bitstring mask template

column.name: numfrms
column.description: number of image frames used to create coadd

column.name: frac_exptime_8
column.description: fraction of band 3 input frames with exptime = 8.8 sec

column.name: frac_exptime_4
column.description: fraction of band 3 input frames with exptime = 4.4 sec

column.name: frac_exptime_2
column.description: fraction of band 3 input frames with exptime = 2.2 sec

column.name: frac_exptime_1
column.description: fraction of band 3 input frames with exptime = 1.1 sec

column.description: QA status for scan: Prelim, Reviewed, or Final

column.name: qual_coadd
column.description: quality score value for coadd

column.description: quality factor qc value for coadd: completion quality

column.name: qi_fact
column.description: quality factor qi value for coadd: image quality

column.name: qa_fact
column.description: quality factor qa value for coadd: astrometry quality
